name: bullish_harami
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool barpatterns.
Tool description: Screener for stock candlestick patterns & indicator signals. 
Screening 21 candlestick patterns & 6 indicator signals (supertrend, macd, rsi)
API description: Fetches a list of stocks exhibiting the Bullish Harami candlestick pattern from the API.

page.description: The page number of results to retrieve. Default is 1.
